title: Shakespeare The Animated Tales vol. 4
description: The Bard gets the full animated treatment with a series of shorts of his most famous plays, voiced by members of the Royal Shakespeare Company. These condensed, 25-minute takes on 12 of Shakespeare's classic tales include "Othello," "Hamlet" and a puppet version of "The Winter's Tale." Tilda Swinton, Brian Cox, Zoe Wannaker and Michael Kitchen are among the stars involved in this intriguing project that hits just the right note for kids.
